title: Are These Parents Wrong For Making Their Kid Prepare His Own Meals?
description:
This couple's 11-year-old kid wants to be vegetarian. The parents are supportive and will buy / prepare the food for the kid. But they're telling him he has to come up with the meal plans and figure out what he's gonna be eating.
Is it fair to ask a kid to do this? Or should the parents have to come up with two dinners for everyone?
